ðŸ“– Summary: The Bluetooth LE Spam repository provides an Android application that leverages Bluetooth Low Energy to broadcast fake device advertisements. This can trigger unwanted pop-up dialogs on nearby devices, simulating connection requests or other service notifications. The app also includes a spam detector to identify the source of such advertisements.
